details.name: ISO 14289-2:2024 - 8.2 Logical structure - 8.2.5.14 Footnotes and Endnotes (FENote) - Ref entry
details.description: Real content that refers to footnotes or endnotes (real content enclosed in FENote structure elements) shall use the Ref entry on the referring structure element to reference the FENote. The corresponding FENote shall also use the Ref entry to identify all citations that reference it
